name: Andy Can't Sleep
description: Ever since kindergarten started, Andy’s parents insist that he starts sleeping alone without the help of his favorite stuffed animals. So through his first week of school, Andy has had nightmares and can’t sleep. But the weekend is here and Andy needs to sleep or he’ll be too tired for another week of school. With the help of lights and his stuffed animal friends, you need to vanquish the scary monsters coming to haunt Andy’s dreams.
